p: Sodium phosphate buffer, acetylcholinesterase from Electrophorus electricus (EC 3.1.1.7, Type VI-S), butyrylcholinesterase from equine serum (EC 3.1.1.8), Tween 20, anhydrous sodium sulphate, ascorbic acid, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), 5,5’-dithiobis(2-nitrobenzoic-acid) (DTNB), acetylthiocholine iodide (ATCI), butyrylthiocholine iodide (BTCI), propyl gallate, β-carotene, physostigmine, and 2,2’-azino-bis(3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulphonic acid) (ABTS) were acquired from Sigma-Aldrich S.p.a. (Milan, Italy). All other reagents were obtained from VWR International s.r.l. (Milan, Italy). All solvents used in this study were of analytical grade.
